urls.title: Pre-Existing Condition Protections Are at Risk in the Wake of COVID-19
urls.description: Ten years ago, the passage of the Affordable Care Act (ACA) ended the ability of insurers to discriminate against people who were sick. Before ACA

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Legalized discrimination against people with health conditions was widespread before the ACA. That health care landscape would be disastrous if restored in the wake of COVID-19 – but the Trump admin is backing a lawsuit that would do exactly that. https://t.co/bwGscsv0TE
